definition: In the sky to be two birds flying wing to wing, on earth to be two trees with branches intertwined/wishing for conjugal bliss
pinyin: zai4 tian1 yuan4 zuo4 bi3 yi4 niao3 , zai4 di4 yuan4 zuo4 lian2 li3 zhi1
traditional: 在天願做比翼鳥，在地願做連理枝
word: 在天愿做比翼鸟，在地愿做连理枝
